name: First Chicago Insurance Company
description: First Chicago Insurance Company is an established Midwest regional insurer that has been providing dependable service to its policyholders since 1920. Over the years, the company has gained a reputation of providing excellent service to their policyholders.

products.name: Benchmark
products.description: The Benchmark personal auto product is a full featured personal auto insurance program that offers many available coverages as well as a broad set of discounts and payment options.  This product is competitively priced and provides you with the protection you need and want.

name: Texas Ranger Managing General Agency
description: Since 1980 management has been involved in underwriting, and sales of auto insurance, as well as life, health, ancillary products and full-line P&C products on a retail level via insurance companies, MGA’s, and independent insurance agencies. The newly formed Texas Ranger MGA was created to expand Warrior’s presence in the Texas market, although the organization has operated in the Texas market for last 15 years

products.name: Texas Renegade
products.description: Texas Renegade is a standard auto program with an amazing array of features at an attractively competitive price.

name: United Security Insurance Company
description: United Security Insurance Company (USIC), formally known as United Security Health and Casualty (USH&C) is a member of the Warrior Insurance Network (WIN). USIC is celebrating its 50th anniversary in 2023 and specializes in providing affordable Personal Lines Auto Insurance products with multiple discounts available, responsive claims handling and quality customer service.

products.name: Road Ranger
products.description: The Road Ranger personal auto prorgam is an innovative auto program designed to monitor driving, while in turn giving a discount for participating in this safe-driving program. Currently available in Indiana and Illinois.
